ValidationRule.description: This rule controles that the lieferservice fields are filled in when the checkbox LieferService is ticked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (AT_LieferService__c = true), OR( ISBLANK( AT_LieferService_Area__c ), ISPICKVAL( AT_Lieferservice_Payment__c,''), ISPICKVAL( AT_Lieferservice_Payment_Online__c ,'')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The information about Lieferservice are mandatories when the field Lieferservice is ticked.
